message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,500.
I'm getting close to accepting, but $11,500 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,500. Can you consider that?
